DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effect MK0524A ( niacin ( + ) laropiprant ) lower bad cholesterol raise good cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Extended Release ( ER ) Niacin/Laropiprant Add Study ( 0524A-082 )
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year age older stable dose lipid therapy Patients lipid level outside recommended range Patients HIV positive
